com.rockhoppertech.music

Class Note

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.rockhoppertech.music.Note
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Timed, Serializable, Comparable<Note>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    MIDINote

    public class Note
extends Object
implements Comparable<Note>, Timed, Serializable
    The Note class is a utility. The implicit unit is "beats". I suppose that seconds might be useful too. The XML stuff is in here. I should move it. although it's a delegate.
    Since:
    1.0
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    See Also:
    Comparable, Serializable, MIDINote, Serialized Form

    • Constructor Detail

      • Note

        public Note()
        Initializes a new Note instance. The startBeat is 1, the duration is 1 and the pitch is Middle C.

      • Note

        public Note(int midiNumber)
        Initializes a new Note instance given just a MIDI number.
        Parameters:
        midiNumber - an int representing a MIDI note number

      • Note

        public Note(int midiNumber,
            double startBeat,
            double duration)
        Initializes a new Note instance.
        Parameters:
        midiNumber - an int representing a MIDI note number
        startBeat - a double representing the start beat
        duration - a double duration value

      • Note

      • setStartBeat

        public void setStartBeat(double b)
        setStartBeat sets the start beat. The minimum value is 1 which is the beginning of the sequence.
        Specified by:
        setStartBeat in interface Timed
        Parameters:
        b - a double value
